cast.overview: Father Gabriele Amorth, Chief Exorcist of the Vatican, investigates a young boy's terrifying possession and ends up uncovering a centuries-old conspiracy the Vatican has desperately tried to keep hidden.
cast.title: The Pope's Exorcist

details.biography: River Hawkins is a British born actor, he was born in the South of England. His mother is of Irish decent and his father is British. River lives in London. He has played the role of iconic shoe designer Manolo Blahnik and directed and produced the five part series, The Humen Series featuring Bill Nighy.
details.name: River Hawkins
